contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of March, 2006, upon consideration of the Recommendation of the Three-Member Panel of the Disciplinary Board dated January 4, 2006, the Joint Petition in Support of Discipline on Consent is hereby granted pursuant to Rule 215(g), Pa.R.D.E., and it is
ORDERED that John Richard Oare, Jr., be subjected to public censure by the Supreme Court.
Madame Justice BALDWIN did not participate in this matter.
